name: Jigsaw Puzzles Snap!
description:
Love jigsaw puzzles? You'll love this game!

Play over 1,000 puzzles completely FREE! Use YOUR OWN photos or choose from tons of fun categories!

"5/5 awesome jigsaw game..."

"Vast collection of puzzles and fun categories"

"If you are a fan of jigsaw puzzles, you can't go wrong with this solid entry."

- Over 1000 puzzles with new ones added frequently.
- Use your own images for puzzles!
- Customize your game with a wide assortment of piece counts from 12 to 550!
- Free Mode allows you to control the zoom and panning of the board.
- Guided Mode divides the puzzle into sections and lets you complete the puzzle one section at a time. It's perfect for small devices and those massive puzzles.
- Categories including animals, food, cars, landmarks, nature, mountains, beaches, candy, flowers, kittens, puppies, and so much more.
- Portrait or Landscape support.
- iPad and iPhone.
- Piece rotations and multiple shapes.
- Puzzle preview, piece sorting, and loose piece cleanup.
- Simple, intuitive, and fun!

Can you solve them all?
